title: Elon Musk to debut his road map for Tesla after a year of struggles
description: Tesla's stock plummeted as Musk pursued Twitter, the social media site he now owns. Now he's under pressure to build back momentum.

title: TikTok adds 60-minute limit for teens, but leaves big loopholes
description: TikTok said teens can bypass the 60-minute limit by entering a passcode.

title: Some people are upset at the way iPhones charge. Here’s why.
description: Apple's "clean energy charging" feature is designed to reduce your carbon footprint, but it faces surprising blowback.
